goal.en: To understand the Design and Applications of Structural Engineering
goal.ch: 學習工程結構分析的基本原理與計算方法，為瞭解工程結構受載行為的入門課程，亦是未來從事結構工程設計必備的基本學科之一。學生學習工程結構分析模型基本假設、分析原理與計算方法，並瞭解工程結構受力後的行為。

content.en:
Chapter 1：Types of Structures and Loads
Chapter 2 : Analysis of Statically Determinate Structures
Chapter 3：Analysis of Statically Determinate Trusses
(3.1-3.7)
Chapter 4：Internal Loadings Developed in Structural Members
Chapter 8：Deflections (8.1, 8.2, 8.5)
Chapter 9：Deflections Using Energy Methods
Chapter 10：Analysis of Statically Indeterminate Structures by
the Force Method (10.1-10.9)
Chapter 6: Influence Lines for Statically Determinate Structures
content.ch:
Chapter 1：Types of Structures and Loads
Chapter 2 : Analysis of Statically Determinate Structures
Chapter 3：Analysis of Statically Determinate Trusses
(3.1-3.7)
Chapter 4：Internal Loadings Developed in Structural Members
Chapter 8：Deflections (8.1, 8.2, 8.5)
Chapter 9：Deflections Using Energy Methods
Chapter 10：Analysis of Statically Indeterminate Structures by
the Force Method (10.1-10.9)
Chapter 6: Influence Lines for Statically Determinate Structures

textbook.en: "R.C. Hibbeler, ""Structural Analysis (9th Ed., SI Units)"" Pearson,Yuan-Yu Hsieh/“Elementary Theory of Structures,” Fourth Ed., Prentice-Hall."
textbook.ch: "R.C. Hibbeler, ""Structural Analysis (9th Ed., SI Units)"" Pearson,Yuan-Yu Hsieh/“Elementary Theory of Structures,” Fourth Ed., Prentice-Hall."

flex_desc.en: Flexible teaching will be delivered through project or remedial teaching
flex_desc.ch: 彈性教學將以專題或補救教學等學習方式進行

en.competency: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

en: Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Second Year only.Class:B only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCI2004 only.With an average of 50 or above for Required Subjects.

Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCI2004 only.With an average of 50 or above for Required Subjects.

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限二年級。班別:限B。指定課程:必須先修CI2004。且檢定指定課程平均成績達50分以上。
系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。指定課程:必須先修CI2004。且檢定指定課程平均成績達50分以上。
